price: 30. Rabbigaa wuxuu u fidiyaa risiqa kuu doono, oo ku cidhiidhiyaa (kuu doono). Hubaal waa Mid addoomahiisa mar walba Xog Ogaal u ah oo Arka.
arabic: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ يَبۡسُطُ ٱلرِّزۡقَ لِمَن يَشَآءُ وَيَقۡدِرُۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ بِعِبَادِهِۦ خَبِيرَۢا بَصِيرٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: inna rabbaka yabsuṭu al-riz'qa liman yashāu wayaqdiru innahu kāna biʿibādihi khabīran baṣīran
